info.name: Stack Exchange sites: Hide left nav
info.description: Hides the left-hand navigation sidebar, to reclaim some page width.
info.additionalInfo:
Supports Stack Overflow which has the new theme today, and should automatically support all Stack Exchange sites as they are migrated over as well. Has no effect on sites that have yet to adopt the new theme, but shouldn't do any harm if it's enabled but not yet necessary. Updates/Changelog
2018-08-22:
Added serverfault.com to domain match list
2018-08-11:
Added askubuntu.com to domain match list
